Class HiveHarFileSystem

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable, org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configurable

    public class HiveHarFileSystem
extends org.apache.hadoop.fs.HarFileSystem
    HiveHarFileSystem - fixes issues with Hadoop's HarFileSystem
